release.action: InterruptCapturingThread non-final. It's designed to be sub-classed.
Renamed DateFactory to Clock, thanks to Alex for the suggestion.
Added CompositeFactory. Pass in a list of factories and they will be called in sequence, trying the next on failure until all have been attempted.
Updated Factory interface to throw FactoryException.
Added ExceptionWrapper class to wrap any exception as another. Useful when calling out to components when you usually catch and rethrow as application exception.
Added a MatcherCondition to the Conditions class. Useful for utilising matchers as Conditions.
Updated the Timeout class to use a private constructor but a public static creation method timeout().
Updated WaitFor to pass in a Timeout object rather than a Duration. Syntax will look look waitOrTimeout(serverStartup(), timeout(seconds(20)));
Updated WaitFor to use a configurable sleep period.
Fixed "Unexpected behaviour using ConcurrentTestRunner, RepeatingRule and a sleep in test" bug.
Created a branch for 1.6 support. See http://code.google.com/p/tempus-fugit/source/browse/#svn/branches/java6
